title: BEDT-TTF radical-cation salts with tris(oxalato)chromate and guest additives
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,18444-18452
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA03425B, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Toby J. Blundell, Joseph O. Ogar, Michael J. Brannan, Elizabeth K. Rusbridge, John D. Wallis, Hiroki Akutsu, Yasuhiro Nakazawa, Shusaku Imajo, Lee Martin
We present three new additions to the family β′′-(BEDT-TTF)4[(A)Cr(C2O4)3]·guest with the guest molecules toluene, phenol, or salicylaldehyde. These new guests are liquid or solid additives within the electrocrystallisation medium.
